content.text:
# KML Best Young Player Award

The KML Best Young Player Award () is an award for the top-tier professional basketball league in Estonia, the Korvpalli Meistriliiga.
Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Season !! Player !! Team
|-

| Indrek Suur||Tallinna Kalev
|-

| Veljo Vares||Tartu Ülikool-Delta

|-

| Tanel Sokk||Nybit
|-

|-

|-
